name: IANUX Soluciones Tecnológicas
overview:
We are a young company that started its activities in February 2008 with the aim of developing solutions based on free software for solving company’s computer problems.

IANUX means in search of something better, we know that skilled and experienced human capital is difficult to recruit, however, we are committed to be your technology partner by providing the best service we can do that is to work efficiently transforming technology into an everyday tool.

We are a very dynamic company, since we are always at the forefront of technology, and constantly doing research to build solutions that guarantee our clients stability and an acceptable level of computer security.

Our strength is the ability to have worked on projects to integrate different technologies (proprietary and / or free). This is the key for providing solutions that minimize technology investment so as to avoid throwing away their past investments.

IANUX is a company that provides technology solutions based on free software and / or open source. Our main services are: infrastructure, networks and servers, Identity Management, Software Factory , Telecommunications, Outsourcing, Security Audits, IT Training, Migration Server / Workstation Windows to Linux / Unix / BSD)

Each of the solutions we offer:

Stability Scalability Integration Functionality Security
